openai1972604360204210600.content: Introducing parental controls in ChatGPT.  Now parents and teens can link accounts to automatically get stronger safeguards for teens. Parents also gain tools to adjust features & set limits that work for their family.  Rolling out to all ChatGPT users today on web, mobile soon.
openai1972604360204210600.author: openai

openai1919453165575143778.content: 4 facts about our structure:  -OpenAI will continue to be controlled by the current nonprofit  -Our existing for-profit will become a Public Benefit Corporation  -Nonprofit will control & be a significant owner of the PBC  -Nonprofit & PBC will continue to have the same mission
openai1919453165575143778.author: openai

openai1894495906952876101.content: Starting today, we’re rolling out a version of Advanced Voice powered by GPT-4o mini to give all ChatGPT free users a chance to preview it daily across platforms.  The natural conversation pace and tone are similar to the GPT-4o version while being more cost effective to serve.
openai1894495906952876101.author: openai

openai1889822643676913977.content: Two updates you'll like—    OpenAI o1 and o3-mini now support both file & image uploads in ChatGPT    We raised o3-mini-high limits by 7x for Plus users to up to 50 per day
